snippet.title: Moroi - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Check out fast-paced, action-packed and brutal gameplay for Moroi, as revealed during Guerrilla Collective 2021. In Moroi, you are an amnesic hero that wakes up in a weird castle. Interacting with different characters, you find that the way to escape the castle is to defeat The Red King. Making your way lower and lower through the castle, you realize that he is not who you expect.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
